question: How do we join the club? Is there any procedure?
answer: There is no procedure to join the club, everyone is welcome to join the club! Just join the discord server to stay up to date with all the upcoming meetings of all domains and also find resources for past meetings.

question: Will there be offline sessions?
answer: This year, we will be conducting sessions both offline and online!

question: Can we join more than one domain?
answer: Yes you can! Try out all the domains, find which ones you like the best and join the sessions!
